reviewText: My husband is a triathlete and has found this video to be of great help in his quest for high end performance in his Senior Games Events. His skills have improved since viewing this video. All athletes, male and female alike, should purchase this video whether competive or not. We have purchased the nutrition supplies from Hammer Gel mentioned in the video and that has also improved my husband's athletic abilities even though he has been physically active all of his life. My husband Alfred is a nationally ranked triathlete as of July 1, 2007 and now 70 years of age. WOW!
